data.actual_result: Claim Account pops up after you have inputted the 3rd letter.
data.expected_result: Claim Account button should just be lit up either without any content, or as soon as you input 1 letter.
data.short_description: Claim Account box only lights up after you input at least 3 letters in the password box.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get to the Claim Account screen. - Fill your email, and fill your password. - Observe as you press your 3rd letter of your password.
